it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.server

Class SocketRemoteView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.observer.RemoteObservable<ViewEvent>
      • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.server.SocketRemoteView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemoteView, SocketServerCommandTarget, RemoteObserver<ModelUpdate>, Runnable, Remote

    public class SocketRemoteView
extends RemoteObservable<ViewEvent>
implements RemoteView, Runnable, SocketServerCommandTarget
    A class representing a remote view connected via a socket connection
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Running the connection consists in the following loop:
        1. wait for a command from the client
        2. deserialize the command
        3. execute the command
        4. wait for the next command
        The loop interrupts when the connection closes Then there is a loop which runs on another thread to keep alive the connection
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

      • getUsername

        public String getUsername()
        Returns the username of the player associated with this view. It returns null if the username has not already been set (prior to login)
        Specified by:
        getUsername in interface RemoteView
        Specified by:
        getUsername in interface SocketServerCommandTarget
        Returns:
        username of the player, if it has been set, null otherwise
